turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Jack, can you grab me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where are you so I can get it close by

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use the one in Blue Ash on Kenwood

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what do you want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I dunno. Not the usual. I want to try their seasonal drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay - do you know what it is?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a black and white mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, let's do full milk - why not?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, with the whipped cream or no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, whipped cream too

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add an extra shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. Should I pay and you reimburse me?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, my card is on file with the app you have access to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Black and white mocha, grande, full milk, whipped cream and and extra shot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready in 15 min at the Kenwood, Blue Ash location. You should see a text of the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thanks, Jack.
